name: Lost Wanderer's Wand
description:
Control a legendary unicorn or dragon as they explore a dungeon in an attempt to find a magical item that will help them get back what they have lost. 

This is a short one-dungeon RPG. You do not gain levels -- equipment drops raise multiple stats including max HP. Defeat monsters on the way and claim the things found on them to prepare yourself for whatever may await you at the end.

The first version of this was uploaded as part of 2021's Global Game Jam, created with RPG Maker MV and assets made by a team of online friends. This is an updated "content complete" version that includes more complicated enemy move sets, several secrets, and something lurking from the dark.
